about_the_game:
Get ready for a playful, emotional, and steamy adventure in Tomboy: Annoying Childhood Friend, an adult visual novel that explores the love-hate bond between childhood friends Jimmy and Nana.

Plot Summary:

Join Jimmy and his mischievous, tomboyish childhood friend Nana in this steamy, emotional visual novel. Years after their playful but troublesome school days, fate brings them back together during an unexpected reunion. What starts as an annoying reminder of the past soon turns into a journey of discovery, challenges, and unexpected feelings as the two find themselves stranded and relying on each other to get back home.

Key Features:

  • Engaging Storytelling: A linear visual novel with no choices, perfect for those who enjoy a well-crafted, focused narrative.

  • Emotional Depth: Explore the dynamic relationship between Jimmy and Nana, filled with humor, tension, and heartfelt moments.

  • 18+ Animated Scenes: Enjoy 6 fully animated scenes and 1 non-animated scene.

  • Short and Sweet Gameplay: A concise experience with a playtime of 30-60 minutes.

Dive into a playful, nostalgic, and sensual story in "Tomboy: Annoying Childhood Friend."

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages and topics not suited for sensitive audience, such as:
- Female and Male Nudity
- Various animated sex scenes
- Sexually explicit dialogues
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

name: Tomboy: Annoying Childhood Friend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Reunite with your mischievous childhood tomboy friend in a playful, emotional journey filled with humor, challenges, and steamy moments. Will rivalry turn into romance?
